\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
I \&\&\&\& {\mathcal C} \& F \\
\&\&\&\&\&\& \color{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}{\varphi _\ast F} \\
\&\& J \&\&\& R
\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "F", from=1-1, to=1-5]
\arrow["{\varphi }"', from=1-1, to=3-3]
\arrow["{\alpha }"', color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, Rightarrow, from=2-7, to=1-6]
\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\varphi _\ast F}"{pos=0.2}, color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, curve={height=-12pt}, from=3-3, to=1-5]
\arrow[""{name=2, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "R"', curve={height=12pt}, from=3-3, to=1-5]
\arrow[""{name=3, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\gamma }", Rightarrow, from=3-6, to=1-6]
\arrow["{\exists_!\theta}"', Rightarrow, dashed, from=3-6, to=2-7]
\arrow["\circlearrowleft"{description}, draw=none, from=2-7, to=3]
\arrow["\alpha"', color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, shorten <=5pt, shorten >=5pt, Rightarrow, from=1, to=0]
\arrow["\theta"', shorten <=4pt, shorten >=4pt, Rightarrow, dashed, from=2, to=1]
\arrow["\gamma"{pos=0.2}, shift left=4, shorten <=4pt, shorten >=4pt, Rightarrow, from=2, to=0]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
